metadata.titleEn: Quantitative Tescan Integrated Mineral Analyzer (TIMA) data set of tectonite from the North Himalayan Ramba Gneiss Dome
metadata.titleCn: 北喜马拉雅然巴片麻岩穹隆构造岩定量化泰斯肯矿物相综合分析数据集
metadata.description:
Data content: This data set is the quantitative comprehensive mineral facies analysis data of tectonite from RAMBA gneiss dome obtained by the Tescan Integrated Mineral Analyzer. The data includes the type, content, structural characteristics, distribution characteristics of the whole mineral facies in the tectonite, as well as the type, abundance and main hosted mineral facies information of the full spectrum elements. 
Data source and processing method: The data were obtained by four high spatial and temporal resolution EDAX energy spectrometers mounted on a Tescan field emission scanning electron microscope. The electrons outside the atomic nucleus of a measuring point on the mineral surface are bombarded by a high-energy electron beam, the transition between different energy levels or excited to escape into free electrons and release photons with a certain energy. The type and content of the mineral element can be accurately calibrated by the signals captured by different energy channels of the energy spectrum detector. Then, automatic comparison and matching are carried out in the database with nearly 5000 mineral phases, so as to fulfill the accurate determination of mineral phases and the element abundance mapping. The voltage is 25 kV, the working distance is 15mm, and the spot size is 100nm.
Data quality description: Due to four energy spectrum detectors being equipped, the data acquisition time is short, the accuracy is high, the requirements for sample morphology are low, the detection limit is low, the data quality is very high and strongly reliable. 
Data application achievements and prospects: Sample size is 27mm x 47mm standard optical thin section, scanning area is full slice scanning with High-resolution scanning mode, and the step size is set to 1μm. Through data analysis, we have obtained the mineral assemblage characteristics of each structural unit of the Ramba gneiss dome, completed the metamorphic grade and metamorphic facies zoning, and put forward the structural thermal evolution model of the Ramba gneiss dome. This technic has been widely recognized and used in structural geology, petrology, geochronology, ore selecting, metallurgy, metal processing and manufacturing, and other disciplines and industries.
metadata.descriptionCn:
数据内容：本数据集为泰斯肯综合矿物相分析系统获得的然巴片麻岩穹隆构造岩定量化综合矿物相分析数据，数据包含然巴穹隆构造岩内全矿物相种类、含量、结构特征、分布特征以及全谱元素种类、丰度、主要赋存矿物相信息。
数据来源及加工方法：该数据来源于北京大学造山带与地壳演化教育部重点实验室，通过Tescan场发射扫描电子显微镜上搭载的四台高空间、时间分辨率EDAX能谱仪获取。矿物表面某一测点的原子核外电子经过高能电子束轰击，在不同能级间发生跃迁或被激发逃逸成为自由电子，同时释放带有固定能量的光子，通过能谱探测器不同能量通道捕捉到的信号可以精确标定该矿物元素种类及含量，进而在具有近5000中矿物相的数据库中进行自动比对和匹配从而实现矿物相的精确测定以及元素丰度面分布测量。测试电压为25kV，工作距离15mm，束斑100nm
数据质量描述：样品为27mm x 47mm标准薄片，扫描区域为全片扫描，扫描模式为High-Resolution，步长设置1 μm。由于搭载四台能谱探测器，因此数据获取时间短、精度高、对样品表明形貌要求低且检出限低，数据质量高，可信度强。
数据应用成果及前景：通过矿物相数据分析，我们明确了然巴片麻岩穹隆各构造层矿物组合特征，完成了变质级别和变质相分带工作，提出了然巴片麻岩穹隆构造热演化模型。TIMA在构造地质学、变质岩石学、地质年代学以及矿物分选、冶金、金属加工制造等学科和行业内获得了广泛的认可和使用。
metadata.instructions:
File name: the mineral phase data is stored in the specified program format with the name of "xxxx-yyyy.timaproj", where XXXX represents the sampling location and yyyy is the sample number.
Data reading method: this data set contains all quantitative mineral phase analysis data, and the data can only be read and edited by TIMA program officially authorized by tescan company. Tesacn also provides offline processing software, but it can only read data rather than edit it. At the same time, all data can be output in pictures or tables. The output formats include JPG, Tiff, Excel, word, TXT, etc.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：矿物相数据以规定程序格式储存，名称为“XXXX-YYYY.timaproj”，其中XXXX代表样品采样位置，YYYY为样品号。
数据读取方式：该数据集包含所有定量化矿物相分析数据，数据只允许使用Tescan公司官方授权的TIMA程序进行读取和编辑。Tesacn同时也有提供线下处理软件，但是只能实现数据的读取而无法编辑。同时所有的数据都可以以图片或表格形势输出，输出的格式有Jpg, Tiff, Excel, Word, Txt等。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the mineral phase analysis data obtained from comprehensive systems in geostructural studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在地质结构研究中，从综合系统获得的矿物相分析数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: types of mineral phases, contents of mineral phases, structural characteristics of mineral phases, distribution characteristics of mineral phases, types of full-spectrum elements, abundances of full-spectrum elements, main hosting mineral phase information
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 矿物相类型、矿物相含量、矿物相结构特征、矿物相分布特征、全谱元素类型、全谱元素丰度、主要赋存矿物相信息。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the resolution of data collected using Tescan field emission scanning electron microscope methods for quantifying mineral phases?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用Tescan场发射扫描电子显微镜方法收集的数据的分辨率是多少，用于量化矿物相？

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary factors that influence the precision and accuracy of mineral phase identification and element abundance measurement in quantitative mineral phase analysis systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响定量矿物相分析系统中矿物相识别精度和元素丰度测量准确性的主要因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The precision and accuracy of mineral phase identification and element abundance measurement are influenced by several factors, including the use of high spatial and temporal resolution EDAX spectrometers equipped on a Tescan field emission scanning electron microscope. The setup involves a specific test voltage, working distance, and beam spot size, which contribute to the high precision and low detection limits. Additionally, the ability to automatically match and compare results against a comprehensive database of nearly 5000 mineral phases also significantly affects the accuracy of the analysis.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 矿物相识别和元素丰度测量的精度和准确性受到多个因素的影响，包括在Tescan场发射扫描电子显微镜上配备的高空间和时间分辨率EDAX光谱仪的使用。该设置涉及特定的测试电压、工作距离和束斑尺寸，这些因素共同促进了高精度和低检测限。此外，能够自动匹配和比较近5000种矿物相的综合数据库的结果，也显著影响了分析的准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using high-resolution EDAX spectrometers for mineral phase analysis in terms of data accuracy and sample integrity?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用高分辨率EDAX光谱仪进行矿物相分析的后果在数据准确性和样品完整性方面是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using high-resolution EDAX spectrometers has resulted in high data accuracy due to the precision in capturing signals across different energy channels, which accurately identifies mineral element types and quantities. The method also supports high sample integrity, as it requires low sample surface morphology requirements and has a low detection limit, ensuring high-quality data with strong reliability.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用高分辨率EDAX光谱仪可以获得高数据准确性，因为它在不同能量通道中精确捕捉信号，从而准确识别矿物元素类型和数量。这种方法还支持高样品完整性，因为它对样品表面形态的要求较低，并且具有低检测限，确保数据质量高且可靠性强。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives behind collecting and analyzing mineral phase data using a comprehensive mineral phase analysis system in the context of the Ranba gneiss dome structures?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在Ranba片麻岩穹隆结构的背景下，收集和分析矿物相数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives include determining the mineral assemblage characteristics of various structural layers within the Ranba gneiss dome, completing the metamorphic grade and facies zoning work, and proposing a thermal evolution model for the Ranba gneiss dome structure. This comprehensive analysis aids in understanding the geological, metamorphic, and chronological features of the area, which has applications in structural geology, metamorphic petrology, geochronology, and industries like mineral sorting, metallurgy, and metal processing.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括确定Ranba麻粒岩穹隆内各结构层的矿物组合特征，完成变质级别和相带划分工作，并提出Ranba麻粒岩穹隆结构的热演化模型。这一综合分析有助于理解该地区的地质、变质和年代特征，具有在构造地质学、变质岩石学、地球年代学以及矿物分选、冶金和金属加工等行业的应用。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures can be employed to effectively utilize scanning electron microscopy with energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy for comprehensive mineral phase analysis in geological samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以采用哪些程序有效利用扫描电子显微镜和能量色散X射线光谱进行地质样品的全面矿物相分析？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedure involves using a Tescan field emission scanning electron microscope equipped with four high spatial and temporal resolution EDAX spectrometers. The process includes bombarding the mineral surface with a high-energy electron beam, causing outer-shell electrons to transition between energy levels or be ejected as free electrons. This transition releases photons with specific energy, which are captured by the spectrometers' energy channels to accurately determine the mineral's elemental composition and abundance. These results are then matched against a database of nearly 5000 mineral phases to achieve precise mineral phase determination and element abundance mapping. The testing voltage is set at 25kV, the working distance is 15mm, and the beam spot size is 100nm.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该程序涉及使用配备四个高空间和时间分辨率EDAX光谱仪的Tescan场发射扫描电子显微镜。该过程包括用高能电子束轰击矿物表面，导致外层电子在能级之间跃迁或被弹出为自由电子。此跃迁释放出具有特定能量的光子，这些光子被光谱仪的能量通道捕获，以准确确定矿物的元素组成和丰度。这些结果随后与近5000种矿物相的数据库进行匹配，以实现精确的矿物相确定和元素丰度映射。测试电压设置为25kV，工作距离为15mm，束斑尺寸为100nm。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the precise determination of mineral phases and element abundance distribution in complex geological structures such as gneiss domes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在复杂地质结构如片麻岩穹隆中精确确定矿物相和元素丰度分布成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of a Tescan field emission scanning electron microscope equipped with four high spatial and temporal resolution EDAX spectrometers has enabled the precise determination of mineral phases and element abundance distribution. The system captures signals through energy spectrometry to accurately identify mineral element types and content, allowing for automatic comparison and matching with a database containing nearly 5000 mineral phases.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用配备四个高空间和时间分辨率EDAX光谱仪的Tescan场发射扫描电子显微镜，使得矿物相和元素丰度分布的精确测定成为可能。该系统通过能量光谱技术捕获信号，以准确识别矿物元素类型和含量，并允许与包含近5000种矿物相的数据库进行自动比较和匹配。
